roleset.name: destroy
roleset.note: OBLITERATE-V NOTES: Verbnet predicts an instrumental subject. They also bring thedistinction between agent and instrument down to intentionality, whichwe've been trying to avoid. If you feel you can consistently makethat decision, go ahead; otherwise only use arg2 when there is also anarg0. (from obliterate.01-v)

example.name: no instrument
example.text: Program traders argue that a reinstatement of the rule would obliterate the ``pricing efficiency'' of the futures and stock markets.
example.arg: the ``pricing efficiency'' of the futures and stock markets

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Mary obliterated John's fragile self-esteem with a single dirty look.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Although sympathetic to their destitution, Atwood is appalled at their obliteration of a site's archaeological value.
